name: Steve Alexander
education: University of Central Florida - Bachelor's degree in Radio/Television & Digital Media

experience.description: MVRK, a WPI agency, is an innovative integrated, experiential, and location-based entertainment studio that perfectly blends thoughtful design, strategy, creative technology, and engineering to create unforgettable experiential storytelling. Notable partners include: Disney, Hulu, NHL, Amazon, Google, General Mills, The North Face, Intel, and many others.

Powered by Google for Entrepreneurs, Startup Grind is a global startup community designed to educate, inspire, and connect entrepreneurs. Startup Grind aims to build a connected network of vibrant startup communities to help fuel innovation, economic growth and prosperity at the local level.
Therewolf is a social experience discovery platform allowing consumers to intelligently discover experiences/destinations of interest, while providing real-time analytics to marketers.

bio: Steve Alexander is the CXO at MVRK, a WPI agency based in Orlando, Florida, specializing in integrated, experiential, and creative technology solutions. With over 11 years of experience at MVRK and a background in executive roles across various startups and technology companies, Steve has been recognized with a 40 Under 40 honor. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Radio/Television & Digital Media from the University of Central Florida and is passionate about event management, sales, and driving executive visibility.
